CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Blends bass level and bass hits into the beat calculation (X: bass level weight, Y: bass hits weight)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Exponent applied to audio values before mixing (X: bass level curve, Y: bass hits curve; higher = more extreme response)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Luminance threshold that determines which parts of the media create the distance field (higher = only bright areas)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_cutoff

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scales the media input sampling (higher = zoomed in closer)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Shifts the media sampling position (X: horizontal offset, Y: vertical offset)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_offset

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Base thickness of the concentric line pattern (higher = thicker lines)
CONTROLS.NAME: line_thickness

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Phase offset for animated color cycling (X and Y shift different color channels)
CONTROLS.NAME: color_base

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Exponential falloff rate for line brightness with distance (higher = faster fade)
CONTROLS.NAME: line_fade

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Frequency of concentric line pattern (X: off-beat frequency, Y: on-beat frequency; lower = wider spacing)
CONTROLS.NAME: line_beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of the beat-responsive flash effect
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Beat range during which the flash is visible (X: fade-in start, Y: full brightness; creates smooth transition)
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Beat-reactive zoom multiplier applied from the distortion center (X: off-beat zoom, Y: on-beat zoom)
CONTROLS.NAME: dist_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Beat-reactive rotation applied around the distortion center (X: off-beat rotation, Y: on-beat rotation)
CONTROLS.NAME: dist_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Center point for distance-based zoom and rotation effects (X: horizontal center, Y: vertical center)
CONTROLS.NAME: dist_offset

DESCRIPTION: Hypnotic topographic line patterns flow and pulse around your media, creating contour-map-like visualizations that respond dynamically to audio. Concentric rings ripple outward from bright regions, with beat-reactive spacing and mesmerizing color cycling.
TITLE: Bouncing lines
